title: of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister enterprise trade employment) order 2024

title: of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 2. Laura Mannion, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Laura Mannion, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Enterprise, Trade and Employment, is appointed to 
be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment, with 
effect from 9 April 2024.
text_norm: 2 laura mannion particular whose address deposited office department enterprise trade employment appointed special adviser minister enterprise trade employment effect 9 april 2024

title: of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 3. Brian Keegan, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
3. Brian Keegan, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Enterprise, Trade and Employment, is appointed to 
be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment, with 
effect from 23 April 2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

14 May, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 17th May, 2024.
